page.title: 07Religion around Barnt Green
page.content: This page does not give information about the buildings such as St. Andrew's Church; St. Michael's Church; the Baptist Church or the Quakers' Friends Meeting House. Instead, we have found out about the {'out of church'}life of the people. There are{housegroups}which are for adults who meet in each others homes to learn about Jesus and to get to know people. There are 12 leaders for 6 groups. There are about 60 people who attend these housegroups. There are activities and groups for young people also. They are called {'Focus', 'Scramblers', 'climbers', {'adventurers', 'pathfinders' and {'mountaineers'. }There are about 60 children involved.some of the people attend churches in nearby Alvechurch, Blackwell and Lickey.
